page.title: 09FAMILIES IN A WARE SCHOOL
page.content: There are 83 girls and 75 boys aged between 7 and 11 in our school. {Family sizes:}6% are only children. 58% have 2 children in the family. 28% have 3 children and 8% have 4. {Holidays 1984:}9% had no holiday. 36% had at least 1 holiday abroad. 67% had at least 1 holiday in Britain. {Transport:}94% have a bicycle. 95% of the families have a car. 43% have 2 cars.9% have 3 cars. 14% of parents use a train to work. 6% use a bus. {Pets:}76% of the children have at least 1 pet. 36% keep fish.29% have a dog. 27% have a cat.11% have guinea pigs. 7% have hamsters.3% have a tortoise. Only one person has a horse.
